message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000. I'm confident this represents a fair starting point for discussion.  What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree the product has some nice features, $13,000 is a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider $9,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping to get for the product.  Could you do $11,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. $11,500 is still a bit too high for me.  How about we split the difference at $10,250?
Hi Bob, you're getting closer!  I appreciate you working with me on this. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000 even? I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.
Hi Alice, thanks again for working with me.  I'm getting closer to what I can afford, but $11,000 is still pushing it a bit. Could we try $10,500?
